SectionBody.Text: A secured party does not owe a duty based on its status as secured party:

Subsection.Text: To a person who is a debtor or obligor, unless the secured party knows:

Paragraph.Text: That the person is a debtor or obligor;
The identity of the person; and
How to communicate with the person; or

Subsection.Text: To a secured party or lienholder that has filed a financing statement against a person, unless the secured party knows:

Paragraph.Text: That the person is a debtor; and
